Zombie Fist

April 13, 2025 Tags: Arcade
Step into a fast-paced 2D action world where you are the lone hero standing against waves of enemies! In this adrenaline-pumping arcade-style game, you control a martial arts master who performs punches, kicks, and other powerful moves with just a click of the mouse. Gameplay Highlights: Enemies appear randomly from both left and right sides of the screen. React quickly and click to attack with precision&mdash;time your moves to survive! Watch out as the pace increases and the enemies come faster! Clean and vibrant 2D visuals make the action feel smooth and satisfying.
